## Required Technology

Make sure to sign up or download the following software *(in order)*

1. [LaTeX](https://www.latex-project.org/get/)
2. [Overleaf](https://www.overleaf.com): Online $\LaTeX$ editor
3. [R/R Studio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
4. [Quarto](https://quarto.org): An open-source scientific and technical publishing system 
5. [CiteDrive](https://app.citedrive.com): Online reference manager which integrates well with Quarto and Overleaf 
6. [Git](https://git-scm.com/downloads) and [Github](https://github.com): Version control
---

We will get to this towards the end of the quarter

7. [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com): Website hosting service *(sign up using Github account)*
